channel.title: DenyHosts on SAMZONG
channel.description: Recent content in DenyHosts on SAMZONG

item.title: Denyhosts增加服务器SSH黑名单机制
item.description: 查看当前服务器失败登录的统计： cat /var/log/secure | awk '/Failed/{print $(NF-3)}' | sort | uniq -c | sort -n | awk '{print $2" = "$1}' Install denyhosts # 需要预先安装epel源 sudo yum install -y epel-release sudo yum install -y denyhosts 配置文件解析 默认配置文件/etc/denyhosts。
